Title: Relates to environmental assessment of historic preservation plan
Summary: Relates to the environmental assessment of a historic preservation plan; addresses environmental impact statements, dates for filing drafts of such statewide comprehensive historic preservation plan, funds available for historic preservation purposes, and the New York state archaeological survey assistance fund.
LawCode: Amd §§8-0111, 70-0109 & 8-0109, En Con L; amd §14.07, Pks & Rec L; add §99-qq, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, and the state finance law, in relation to environmental assessment of historic preservation plan
